div.p:
Due to rising concerns of the Coronavirus, Hempstead ISD will remain closed through next week. ALL classes and activities have been cancelled through Friday, March 20. We remain vigilant, and are taking all precautions necessary. We will keep you updated as information becomes available.
Remember, basic hygiene practices is still the best preventative measure.
